short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The marketplace, but with better sorting/searching and UI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds functionality to the Paladins Bounty Marketplace Beta website, enabling you to view a table of all the available skins, which is sortable and searchable.
